column5: so we headed out to the driving range. brrrrr  we could barely get a tee in the ground so some drives were hit off lil mounds of snow lol  good times! I hit two decent drives out of about 30 hahaha. very hard with winter gear on and the temp was a warm -19
Looks like fun times,little cool,but fun times lol.!!!!!

cant see it rob but the other side of the field had barely any snow. we only lost one ball.  also, the river froze up purdy good over night:) im already seeing some ice fishing reports from smaller back lakes on fb.
pink they might be blue with those temperatures
haha I showed him your post and he just laughed.
haha I showed him your post and he just laughed.   LOL Left is right.LOL
Ah your form is all wrong, straighten your back, ease those knees, don't lift your shoulders. But I must admit, your golf attire is impeccable.
frig lol.  you show me a proper swing in those tenps with 20lbs of gear on hahaha. Im happy I even made contact with the ball and didnt break a hip or something lol
I can imagine it's like playing volleyball with full snow gear haha.
haha. yeah it was rediculous. couldnt even take a full swing. felt like the stay puffed marshmallow man trying to golf lol. fun though:)
